name: TUMBAL
description:
Poster & Cover Game Title

It all started with the four young people who entered a forest where there was a shaman who was ready to make them sacrifice.

Let's play the game "TUMBAL" with your friends and decide who will be the Killer or the Survivor.

Requirements :

1. Internet connection

2. 3-5 Players

3. 2GB RAM

4. Windows 7

-

Credits :

1. Bagas Azril as Game Designer, Project manager, VFX Artist

2. Hillary Rizqi as Environment Design, 2D Artist, Sound Design

3. Ihzam Chairir as Programmer

4. Elyzabeth Cipra as 3D Artist, Character Design

5. Fanarisda Sabila as Voice Over

6. Yashinta as Voice Over
